cause.description:
As we all know... my brother, Armand, refuses to get a facebook. After much deliberation, I've decided to make a cause to get him to get one.
YOU KNOW YOU WANT HIM TO! JOIN THE CAUSE! LIVE THE DREAM! BE THE LEGEND!
Here's an update. Armand has stated his demands. We need thirty people, five of which are asian females. Then Gareth needs to buy him food at IN n Out.
SIGN GARETH'S PETITION! WE NEED 30 SIGNATURES!!
1. Armand Domalewski needs a facebook
2. Armand Domalewski has an asian fetish
cause.mission: Get Armand to get a damn facebook!
cause.name: Armand Domalewski Facebook Force
